Text: Thank you again for all your great uploads. If you could upload any more of these great LINE RECORDS releases from Germany, it woud be most appreciated. Any artists at all would be great, just those LINE releases are awesome. Especially with your great quality scans and file quality. Thank you.
I am glad that you like the music.sure, there are even more,I must look up what is still not available here,as there are many albums on several occasions here.
